response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe holds significant value. It's crafted with high-quality materials and designed to meet your needs effectively. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase this product for $120. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure it at a special rate. I trust that you'll find its benefits worth the investment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
